hiveArticle.title: ICOs are so popular.. They Got a 100% Dedicated Magazine Now!
hiveArticle.body:
If we aint in mainstream now then i dont know what mainsteam can be. Currently in kiosks you can buy magazine dedicated to explain what are ICOs, check interviews with current CEOs and such. The ETH craze made it to the media. For starters - no this is not a joke.. its real. # Meet ICOCROWD ## Here is the cover. https://image.isu.pub/170704210803-a8d172f92273039cda0af86defc5dcac/jpg/page_1.jpg ## Here is the portal. http://i.imgur.com/dLU2BiN.jpg ## And a Video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mkz9smXDLUk Not enough? Im sure you want to read it all ;) http://i.imgur.com/0C0DVit.png You can and legally - https://issuu.com/icocrowd/docs/ico_crowd_-_issuu Write in comments what do you think of this idea or what interested you most from reading the magazine.

Follow, Resteem and VOTE UP @kingscrown creator of http://fuk.io blog for 0day cryptocurrency news and tips!
